VIEWPORT EXTENSION Adds the Viewport mix-in class to adv3Lite A Viewport is an object that allows you to look into one room from another when you examine it or look through it (say); this can be used to model windows or CCTV monitors and the like. VERSION 1 27-Jul-13 Usage: include this extension after the adv3Lite library but before your own game-specific files. The senseRegion.t module must also be present.
